Again <S%G3825><s%>, ye have heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it hath been said <S%G4483><s%> <S%G5681><s%> by them of old time <S%G744><s%>, Thou shalt <S%G1964><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> forswear thyself <S%G1964><s%> <S%G5692><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> shalt perform <S%G591><s%> <S%G5692><s%> unto the YY <S%G2962><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> oaths <S%G3727><s%>:
